description.value:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.20jNBiIIxaiOVyi0]{Oozemorph Dedication}, at least two other class feats from the oozemorph archetype

You can connect with oozes (and other amorphous aberrations, at the GMâ€™s discretion) on a rudimentary level. You can use Diplomacy to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.OX4fy22hQgUHDr0q]{Make an Impression} on oozes and to make very simple @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.DCb62iCBrJXy0Ik6]{Requests} of them. In most instances, oozes will give you time to make your case.
